environment_variables.SPACK_DEPENDENCIES: ^py-numpy@1.20.3/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' py-numpy@1.20.3 % ${SPACK_COMPILER}) ^openblas@0.3.17/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' openblas@0.3.17 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~ilp64 threads=none) ^hdf5@1.10.7/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' hdf5@1.10.7 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~mpi)
environment_variables.SPACK_SPEC: adios2@2.7.1 % gcc@10.2.0 +blosc +bzip2 ~dataman ~dataspaces ~endian_reverse +fortran +hdf5 ~ipo ~mpi +pic +png +python +shared +ssc +sst +sz +zfp ^py-numpy@1.20.3/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' py-numpy@1.20.3 % gcc@10.2.0) ^openblas@0.3.17/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' openblas@0.3.17 % gcc@10.2.0 ~ilp64 threads=none) ^hdf5@1.10.7/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' hdf5@1.10.7 % gcc@10.2.0 ~mpi)
